ai-kv2.2:1.3_0: There is a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, the underlying tendencies of ignorance, ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:1.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:1.5_0: With ignorance and the underlying tendencies of ignorance, the underlying tendency to ignorance is ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:1.7_0: With ignorance, there’s no hindrances, ignorance. Ignorance, ignorance, the fetters of ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:2.1_0: There is an ordinary person who doesn’t have the underlying tendencies of ignorance, ignorance. The underlying tendencies of ignorance, ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:2.3_0: There is a perfected one, there is ignorance, the underlying tendencies of ignorance, ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:2.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:3.1_0: There is a perfected one, there is noise of ignorance, there is no tendencies of ignorance, the underlying tendency to ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:3.3_0: There is an ordinary person who doesn’t have the underlying tendencies of ignorance, the underlying tendency to ignorance.
ai-kv2.2:3.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:4.3_0: Don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. They’d use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’d use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’d be covetous, malicious, with wrong views, and wrong view.
ai-kv2.2:4.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:5.1_0: There is an ordinary person who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
ai-kv2.2:5.1_1: or whose destroys villages for town:
ai-kv2.2:5.3_0: ‘There is, A person who doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. ...
ai-kv2.2:5.3_1: or whose destroys villages for town:
ai-kv2.2:5.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:6.1_0: whether there is no shelter, no jackal, or living creatures. ...
ai-kv2.2:6.1_1: or whose destroys villages for town:
ai-kv2.2:6.3_0: There is an ordinary person who doesn’t take pleasure in the world. They’d kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
ai-kv2.2:6.3_1: or whose destroys villages for town:
ai-kv2.2:6.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:7.3_0: There is another teacher who doesn’t truly understand the teaching, the Saṅgha, the training, and the path leading to peace. Not alert in the past, they don’t truly know about the past or the future.
ai-kv2.2:7.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:8.1_0: Not knowing the teaching, there is no different things in the Saṅgha, not knowing the training, not knowing the past and the future. Not knowing the past, they don’t comprehend theoretically, and they don’t lead to penetration.
ai-kv2.2:8.3_0: Even if there’s no other reason, there’s no other comparation in the Saṅgha ...
ai-kv2.2:8.3_1: When you have no practice in this way, you should say that when you have no grounds in the past,
ai-kv2.2:9.1_0: There is an ordinary person who doesn’t truly understand the teaching, the Saṅgha, and the Saṅgha.
ai-kv2.2:9.1_1: Formerly arranged in the way that is misconception,
ai-kv2.2:9.3_0: There is another kind of state, in the Saṅgha, which not knowing the teachings, or not.
ai-kv2.2:9.3_1: Formerly arranged in the way that is misconception,
ai-kv2.2:9.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:10.1_0: There is no way, no meaning in the teaching, not knowing the Saṅgha, there is no other reason why.
ai-kv2.2:10.1_1: Formerly arranged in the way that is misconception,
ai-kv2.2:10.3_0: There is no ordinary person who doesn’t truly understand the teaching, or the Saṅgha.
ai-kv2.2:10.3_1: Formerly arranged in the way that is misconception,
ai-kv2.2:10.4_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv2.2:11.3_0: Does a perfected one haven’t given up greed, hate, and delusion—so they’re unable to arise in the future?
ai-kv2.2:11.5_0: Even if a perfected one has given up greed, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance is unable to arise in the future.
ai-kv2.2:12.5_0: He hasn’t given up conscience and prudence, made like a palm stump, obliterated so it’s unable to arise in the future.
ai-kv2.2:12.7_0: Even if a perfected one has given up conscience and prudence, he is cut off at the root, made like a palm stump, obliterated, and unable to arise in the future,
ai-kv2.2:13.3_0: Having developed the path to giving up greed,
ai-kv2.2:13.6_0: and when a perfected one has been developed by the awakening factors, then you should say:
ai-kv2.2:14.8_0: transporting with respect to a perfected one, but not to be developed,
ai-kv2.2:15.3_0: is not free from greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.2:15.7_0: Seeking the truth, he should be spoken to.
ai-kv2.2:16.2_0: Those who are skilled in the teaching and training don’t understand the teaching of the other,
ai-kv2.2:16.3_0: Unskillful in the Dhamma, there are those who understand the Dhamma,
ai-kv2.2:16.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:17.1_0: Those who are skilled in the Dhamma
ai-kv2.2:17.3_0: Those who are skilled in the Teaching
ai-kv2.2:17.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:18.1_0: Who has given up greed and hate, and who has abandoned these things,
ai-kv2.2:18.3_0: Lust-fitting desiring to give up greed.
ai-kv2.2:18.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:19.3_0: there is no conscience, there is no shame,
ai-kv2.2:19.5_0: When a perfected one has given up another’s teaching, there is no unknown.
ai-kv2.2:19.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:20.1_0: Living in line with the teaching ...
ai-kv2.2:20.4_0: There is the starting point of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv2.2:20.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:21.1_0: For one who has given up hate ...
ai-kv2.2:21.6_0: When a perfected one has a conscience and shame and loses the awakening factors, there is something to be developed.
ai-kv2.2:21.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:22.1_0: They are skilled in the teaching, free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...

ai-kv2.2:22.5_0: There is something to be realized, there is anyone who understands.
ai-kv2.2:22.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv2.2:23.3_0: He has given up greed, hate and delusion, there is no other.
ai-kv2.2:23.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:24.3_0: there is no conscience, there is no shame,

ai-kv2.2:24.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:25.1_0: The path of giving up the unskillful roots of greed ...

ai-kv2.2:25.7_0: When a perfected one has nothing and shameless the awakening factors, there is no unknowingness.
ai-kv2.2:25.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:26.1_0: They’re skilled in the teaching because they’re free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.2:26.2_0: There is no truth for him to be realized, there is no other truth.
ai-kv2.2:26.4_0: They are skilled in the teaching, free of greed, hate, and delusion. ...
ai-kv2.2:26.5_0: There is no truth for him to be realized, there is no other truth.
ai-kv2.2:26.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:27.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
ai-kv2.2:27.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
ai-kv2.2:27.6_0: ‘Such is form, such is the origin of form, such is the ending of feeling.’
ai-kv2.2:27.8_0: Such are choices, such is the origin of choices, such is the ending of choices.
ai-kv2.2:27.9_0: Such is consciousness, such is the origin of consciousness, such is the ending of consciousness.’
ai-kv2.2:27.10_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
ai-kv2.2:28.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
ai-kv2.2:28.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
ai-kv2.2:28.7_0: The ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees the ending of defilements.
ai-kv2.2:28.8_0: The ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees this.
ai-kv2.2:28.9_0: The ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees this.
ai-kv2.2:28.10_0: For one who knows and sees the ending of defilements,
ai-kv2.2:28.11_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
ai-kv2.2:29.4_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding the all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.”
ai-kv2.2:31.2_0: there are three things that are given up:
ai-kv2.2:31.5_0: They’re freed from the four places of loss,
ai-kv2.2:31.6_0: and unable to perform the six grave crimes.”
ai-kv2.2:33.4_0: “Mendicants, when a noble disciple stains the stainless, immaculate vision of the Truth:
ai-kv2.2:33.5_0: ‘Everything that has a beginning has an end.’ They give up the three fetters.
ai-kv2.2:33.6_0: Identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances.”
ai-kv2.2:34.4_0: Don’t know that a woman is or a man, the woman who does not know the road of a woman or a man, or a straw mat?
ai-kv2.2:34.6_0: If that’s been killed, a male riches did not know the road that ows will not know,
ai-kv2.2:35.1_0: There is a woman called herd of decay, not know what work her risks, do not know, “Where do they know? Will not know?”
ai-kv2.2:35.3_0: The perfected one should know the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-return, or the fruit of non-returning,
ai-kv2.2:35.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv2.2:35.5_0: The discussion on unknown is finished.
